title: Next 'hexakill' type event idea
body: I think they should make the next event where you pick a champ but then switch the skin to another champ.  Im thinking a Braum with Teemo abilities would be my first choice.  Or an Urgot with Lee Sin abilities.

replies.body: that would be awesome prepare to meet the kha'zix with vel'koz abilities mwahahahahaha.....or vel'koz with kha'zix abilities........
U mean like dota ability draft correct? Would be cool.
